questions.question: Considering the overall form factor, what is the primary shape of this food item as presented in the product packaging?

Describe the background pattern or texture visible just behind the main text description of the product.

What additional food ingredient, along with beans, is explicitly mentioned on the packaging?
What is the general pattern or style of the design element situated behind the brand logo?

What color dominates the majority of the background of the product packaging?

What is the visible texture of the background area surrounding the brand logo and product description?
